query:
ALTER TABLE marketingTriggers 
ADD COLUMN groupTag VARCHAR(64) NULL COMMENT 'A/B测试分组标签',
ADD COLUMN budget DECIMAL(12,2) NULL COMMENT '预算上限',
ADD COLUMN spent DECIMAL(12,2) DEFAULT 0.00 COMMENT '已消耗金额';
